english.segment1: Here's my life, I give it to You. I place it in Your hands. I place it in Your hands
english.segment2: Here's my heart, You're dwelling inside. I place it in Your hands. I place it in Your hands
english.segment3: For so long I have held on to all that I am. When all You want is for me to place it in Your hands, in your hands, Lord in your hands
english.segment4: Here's my thoughts, I want to think of You. and place them in Your hands. I place them in Your hands
english.segment5: Here's my time, take it as You will. I place it in Your hands. I place it in Your hands
english.segment6: For so long I have held on to all that I am. When all You want is for me to place it in Your hands
english.segment7: Here's my life, I give it You. I place it in Your hands. I place it in Your hands..
